title: Monkfish Bourguignon
description: Meaty monkfish makes a great subsitute for pescatarians in this twist on the classic bourguignon.
ingredients: 1 fresh globe artichoke, heart only, quartered
1 monkfish tail, filleted, skin removed, quartered, carcass reserved
100g/3½ oz pancetta, chopped in 1 cm cubes
4 sprigs parsley, leaves only, finely chopped
